name: Intelgain Technologies
description:
Intelegain drives digital engagement and business value for Start-ups and Enterprises using Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML) and Blockchain to unlock new sources of value creation, solving complex problems and accelerating innovation through development of Enterprise Mobile, Web and Cloud-based applications.
Intelegain helps businesses adopt and leverage the power of mobility in a fast changing mobile ecosystem by building products that provide great customer experiences.
READ MORE...
